data.name: Seek Love All Exceptional Functions
data.detailed_description:
You can get all of the following exceptional functions directly.

SWIFT

The Swift can increase your speed by 100%, the duration is 5 seconds, and the cooling time is 10 seconds.

RECOVERY

This exceptional function called Recovery that allows your life to return to its original state in a very short time, with a cooling time of 15 seconds.

INVULNERABLE

This is Invulnerable. It will resist all attacks for you, does it sound very powerful? It has a duration of 5 seconds and a cooling time of 20 seconds.

GRAVITY

It turns out that this is Gravity, derived from the famous law found by Newton. It can help you attract small objects. It has a duration of 5 seconds and a cooling time of 25 seconds.

BLAZE

This exceptional function called Blaze, it can increase your weapon's attack power by 50%, it will last for 5 seconds, and the cooling time is 30 seconds.

ENDLESS

Endless is coming. This exceptional function can temporarily turn your energy value into infinity. It has a duration of 5 seconds and a cooling time of 35 seconds.

DEAD

Dead is too horrible. You can use this exceptional function to kill your enemies directly. It will last for 5 seconds and the cooling time is 40 seconds.

INTERFERENCE

This is called Interference. When your enemy is disturbed by this exceptional function, It will stop the action. It has a duration of 5 seconds and the cooling time is 50 seconds.

RADIATION

Radiation is very powerful, because the power of heat is huge, you can apply this exceptional function to the enemy, It has a duration of 5 seconds and its cooling time is 60 seconds.

data.short_description: All the exceptional functions in Seek Love.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7 / Windows® 8 / Windows® 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 or AMD Phenom™ X3 8650
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 4400
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 7 / Windows® 8 / Windows® 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 or AMD Phenom™ II X3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Sierra / macOS High Sierra / macOS Mojave
  • Processor: 1.2GHz dual-core Intel Core m3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 615
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Sierra / macOS High Sierra / macOS Mojave
  • Processor: 2.3GHz dual-core Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Plus Graphics 640
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
